TEXT: NL You hold tight to your knife, preparing a fatal attak...

Down the dark alley leading to your next destination, you come across some hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you step forward, you recognize some of them as your "old friends". They all turn to you in eerie unsion as you try to pass through in silence. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Finally...a familiar face! Made up your mind to join us this time?"~
